title: Katherine Jenkins gives birth to her first child, Aaliyah Reign Levitas
text:
Katherine Jenkins gives birth to her first child, Aaliyah Reign Levitas Katherine Jenkins gives birth to her first child, Aaliyah Reign Levitas Share 
Katherine Jenkins has become a mother for the first time after giving birth to a baby girl. 
The 35-year-old Welsh singer said she and husband Andrew Levitas were â€œabsolutely besottedâ€ with their daughter Aaliyah, who was born in New York. Katherine Jenkins performs (Yui Mok/PA) 
In a statement, she said: â€œIntroducing our daughter Aaliyah Reign Levitas, who came loudly into the world weighing almost 7lbs and surrounded by love. 
â€œWe are absolutely besotted with her & grateful for the beautiful blessing of this happy, healthy, little miracle. Mummy is recovering well and Daddy couldnâ€™t be prouder of his two gorgeous princesses. Cwtches all round.â€ 
The star also posted a message and photos of her daughter on Instagram. 
Katherine married husband Andrew, a US filmmaker and artist, at Hampton Court Palace in 2014 after a whirlwind romance. 
The couple went public with their relationship when he accompanied her to Buckingham Palace to collect her OBE in March 2014. 
They announced their engagement after six months of dating. 
The blonde singer was previously engaged to TV presenter Gethin Jones and dated him for four years until splitting in 2011. 
She had spoken about wanting to have children shortly after tying the knot: â€œNow Iâ€™m married, I do want kidsâ€¦ I do really want a family,â€ she said. 
Congratulations have poured in from the starâ€™s friends and many fans. @KathJenkins congratulations to you both!
